testcase.classname: Scenario: TC01 Login with valid credentials
testcase.name: Given I am on Slyde Consumer Website

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC01 Login with valid credentials
testcase.name: When I enter valid \"username\" and \"password\"

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC01 Login with valid credentials
testcase.name: Then I should be logged in successfully

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC01 Login with valid credentials
testcase.name: And Greeted with welcome message

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC01 Login with valid credentials
testcase.name: Scenario: TC01 Login with valid credentials

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC02 Check Forgot password? link
testcase.name: Given I am on Slyde Consumer Website

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC02 Check Forgot password? link
testcase.name: Then I should see \"Forgot password?\" link

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC02 Check Forgot password? link
testcase.name: Scenario: TC02 Check Forgot password? link

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC03 Login with blank username & password
testcase.name: Given I am on Slyde Consumer Website

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC03 Login with blank username & password
testcase.name: When I enter blank \"username\" and \"password\"

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC03 Login with blank username & password
testcase.name: Then I should be displayed with error message \"There was an error with your E-Mail\/Password combination. Please try again.\"

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC03 Login with blank username & password
testcase.name: Scenario: TC03 Login with blank username & password

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC12 Verify that user is able to change new password
testcase.name: Given I am on Slyde Consumer Website

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC12 Verify that user is able to change new password
testcase.name: When I enter valid \"username\" and \"password\"

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC12 Verify that user is able to change new password
testcase.name: Then I should be logged in successfully

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC12 Verify that user is able to change new password
testcase.name: And I should be able to change my existing password to \"newpassword\"

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC12 Verify that user is able to change new password
testcase.name: And I should be displayed with password conformation message \"Successfully changed your password.\"

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC12 Verify that user is able to change new password
testcase.name: Scenario: TC12 Verify that user is able to change new password

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC13 Verify that user receives an error when inputting incorrect current password when changing password
testcase.name: Given I am on Slyde Consumer Website

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC13 Verify that user receives an error when inputting incorrect current password when changing password
testcase.name: When I enter valid \"username\" and \"password\"

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC13 Verify that user receives an error when inputting incorrect current password when changing password
testcase.name: Then I should be logged in successfully

testcase.classname: Scenario: TC13 Verify that user receives an error when inputting incorrect current password when changing password
testcase.name: And I should get error message \"There was an error with your E-Mail\/Password combination. Please try again.\" when provided with wrong current password
